it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class ToolCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.ToolCard

  • public class ToolCard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a tool card. Tool cards allow players to break the rules and do some special actions like moving a die inside their window patter. Each tool card has a cost of one token. Once a tool card has been used, its cost increases by one to a total of two.
